content:
We have a revert PR submitted for a certain fairly obscure regression that will make it into stable this release cycle:

https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/85758

I totally forgot about it until now, but thinking about it, if we're making a revert, it also makes sense to backport the PR, otherwise we'll be ending up with a period where we have different behaviour for the type.
I'll make sure it gets into 1.53 and 1.54
It did not need to get backported to 1.53 as the original patch landed in 1.54 only
